propsFromSource: All properties are stored in source layer
somePropsSetInWebmap: Some properties are stored in this web map
propsSetInWebmap: All properties are stored in this web map
discardProps: Discard properties stored in this web map and instead use properties stored in the source layer.
setPropsInWebmap: Store properties in this web map and no longer use properties stored in the source layer.
propReflectUpdates: The "${label}" property will reflect updates made to the source layer.
propsCannotBeReset: Properties cannot be reset because they are already referenced from the source layer.
propNotConnected: The "${label}" property is no longer connected to the source layer because it has been manually set in this web map.
propsCannotBeDisconnected: Properties cannot be disconnected because they are already set in the web map.
tip: If layer properties are stored in the source layer, any changes to the source layer are reflected in this web map.
